findings.title: ST - Stops Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner, potentially allowing them to take advantage by calling goAddLP without calling the goMoon method.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceeds Fees Limit
findings.description: The contract has redundant checks on maxSellAmount, maxBuyAmount, and walletLimit which are all equal to totalSupply, making them unreachable.

findings.title: BC - Blacklists Addresses
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop addresses from transactions and may take advantage of it by calling the manage_bl function.

findings.title: RLC - Redundant Limit Checks
findings.description: The contract is using redundant checks. The variables maxSellAmount, maxBuyAmount, and walletLimit are all equal to the totalSupply, so they can never be reached.

findings.title: UL - Unused Liquidity
findings.description: The contract will never add liquidity because _sellLPFee is always 0, resulting in lpAmount being zero.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L06 - Missing Events Access Control
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical access control parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: There are variables that are defined in the local scope and are not initialized.
